item.title: Android Internals Deep Dive - Deserialization
item.description: Introduction Serialization and deserialization mechanisms are always risky operations from a security point of view. In most languages and frameworks, if an attacker is able to deserialize arbitrary input (or just corrupt it as we have demonstrated years ago with the Rusty Joomla RCE) the impact is usually the most critical: Remote Code Execution.
